item.title: CS131-lecture-20200901
item.description: Syllabus # CSC131Syllabus_Penn.pdf Send email prior to office hours, makes it easier. A team project will happen. Notes are allowed during quizes! Don’t miss a quiz! https://padlet.com/azizipenn/cuj51f9q36w079ko What is computer engineering? #

item.title: CS131-lecture-20200903
item.description: HW 1 # Article on Boeing 737 MAX disaster. Due next week. How do we create software? # This is the “original approach” to software engineering: Deployments can be done by the developers, or a separate team. Maintenance is typically done by developers, original or not. SLDC Models # Waterfall Model # The completed output from one phase is the necessary input to the next level.
